content:
The real question with a lower priced group is always “How well does it work compared to the top models?” With the new SRAM GX Eagle AXS wireless mountain bike group, the answer is simple: It’s just as good. Seriously. We’ve been riding two sets – one on a mountain bike with a full GX […]

The post SRAM GX Eagle AXS review – First rides, drop bar builds & actual weights appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
